description: This file contains shell script code for initializing the initramfs environment. It sets up essential filesystems, creates necessary device nodes, and finally starts an interactive shell session.

methods.name: do_mount_fs
methods.description: Mounts a filesystem of a given type to a specified directory after checking if the filesystem type is supported.

methods.name: do_mknod
methods.description: Creates device nodes if they do not already exist.
